Trigger.Name: 直线-月环-水波：Cycle of Chaos
月环-水波-直线：Cycle of Retribution
分摊（延时）：Unholy Darkness
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[\w]+:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: (?<spell>Unholy Darkness) from [\w]? for (?<timer>[\d]{1,2})\.\w+ Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: Voidwalker loses/gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting
Trigger.RegularExpression: (1E|1A):[\w]+:Voidwalker (?<buff>(loses|gains)) the effect of Spell-In-Waiting from Voidwalker

Trigger.Name: 石化（延时）：Shadoweye
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[\w]+:(?<name>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: Shadoweye from [\w ]? for (?<timer>[\d]{1,2})\.\w+ Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 散开（延时）：Dark Fire III
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[\w]+:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: (?<spell>Dark Fire III) from [\w]? for (?<timer>[\d]{1,2})\.\w+ Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 地狱之风（延时）：Hell Wind
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[\w]+:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: (?<spell>Hell Wind) from [\w]? for (?<timer>[\d]{1,2})\.\w+ Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: GA100（延时）：Flare
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:[\w]+:(?<player>[\w-' ]+) gains the effect of Spell-In-Waiting: (?<spell>Flare) from [\w]? for (?<timer>[\d]{1,2})\.\w+ Seconds\.

Trigger.Name: 直线击退：21秒
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:........:(?<name>.*?) gains the effect of Sundering Waters from for 21.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: 直线击退：8秒
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:........:(?<name>.*?) gains the effect of Sundering Waters from for 8.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: 直线击退：25秒
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:........:(?<name>.*?) gains the effect of Sundering Waters from for 25.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: 中心击退：8秒
Trigger.RegularExpression: 1A:........:(?<name>.*?) gains the effect of Surging Waters from for 8.00 Seconds

Trigger.Name: BombListX
Trigger.RegularExpression: 03:.{8}:Added new combatant (Bomb Boulder|爆破岩石|ボムボルダー)\.(.*?)Pos: \((?<bombx>[\d]+),[\d]+,[\w-.]+\)

Trigger.Name: #Reset
Trigger.RegularExpression: 04:.{8}:Removing combatant (Bomb Boulder|爆破岩石|ボムボルダー)
